contents.item: The best way to find out if you can trust somebody is to trust them.
Trust starts with truth and ends with truth.

And an unaware witch means a witch who doesn't know she's a witch, and because she's a women that makes her double trouble. Never trust a women." My mothers a women," I said, suddenly feeling a little angry, "and I trust her."Mothers are usually women," said the Spook. "And mothers are usually quite trustworthy, as long as your their son. Otherwise look out!
contents.owner: Joseph Delaney, Revenge of the Witch

contents.item: You see, you closed your eyes. That was the difference. Sometimes you cannot believe what you see, you have to believe what you feel. And if you are ever going to have other people trust you, you must feel that you can trust them, too--even when you’re in the dark. Even when you’re falling.
To be trusted is a greater compliment than being loved.
Never trust anyone, Daniel, especially the people you admire. Those are the ones who will make you suffer the worst blows.
contents.owner: Carlos Ruiz Zafón, The Shadow of the Wind

contents.item: Trusting is hard. Knowing who to trust, even harder.
We're paying the highest tribute you can pay a man. We trust him to do right. It's that simple.
contents.owner: Harper Lee, To Kill a Mockingbird

contents.item: Trust in the LORD with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding. In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.
contents.owner: Anonymous, Holy Bible: King James Version

contents.item: You may be deceived if you trust too much, but you will live in torment unless you trust enough.
That's kind of what trust is, isn't it? A willful self-delusion.
Trust. It is like placing a blade in someone's hand and setting the very point to your heart.
In this world, there was nothing scarier than trusting someone. But there was also nothing more rewarding.
Trust yourself, you will start to trust others.
If you cannot trust yourself, you cannot even trust your mistrust of yourself - so that without this underlying trust in the whole system of nature you are simply paralyzed
Never trust he who trusts everyone.
contents.owner: Carlos Ruiz Zafón, The Shadow of the Wind

contents.item: Without trust, there can be no genuine peace. Neither in politics, nor in the quiet individuality of the heart and spirit.
contents.owner: Timothy Zahn, Vision of the Future

contents.item: You cannot produce trust just like you cannot 'do' humility. It either is or is not.
If you are untrustworthy, people will not trust you.
The best way to guard your heart was to trust a good man to take care of it for you.
